title: Tell me about Orchard and Viridity.

messages.content: Tell me about Orchard and Viridity.

Orchard Digital Marketing is an organization that has incubated Viridity Technologies, which suggests that Orchard provides support and resources to help Viridity grow and succeed. Viridity Technologies is a company with Matt McKeown as an executive and founding partner. The company focuses on areas related to data and AI, as indicated by their first employee hire, Aedhan Scott, who is a Data and AI Engineer. This implies that Viridity is likely involved in developing technologies or solutions in the field of data science and artificial intelligence.
